name: 顏炳郎
objective: 工業機器人概論，基礎理論分析：運動學，動力學，控制等，機器人之設計程序，機器人在彈性裝配與製造系統之應用分析與系統設計，智慧型機器人，個案研究等 。
schedule:
Course Outline:
•　　Topic 1: Introduction Today’s Robots and Future Challenges
•　　Topic 2: Spatial Descriptions and Transformations, Lab
•　　Topic 3: Forward Kinematics of a Manipulator, Lab
•　　Topic 4: Inverse Kinematics of a Manipulator, Lab
•　　Topic 5: Trajectory Generation, Lab
•　　Topic 6: Position Control of a Manipulator, Lab
•　　Topic 7: Force Control of a Manipulator, Lab
•　　Topic 8: Visual Servo of a Manipulator, Lab
•　　Topic 9: Current Robot Technology Development
scorePolicy: Grading: Homework and Quiz: 70%, Middle Report: 15%, Final Report: 15%
